籤詩版本二:
Esikhathini esidlule, ngalahlekelwa inaliti yami esikebheni sami, kodwa manje ngisayifuna olwandle.
Uma inaliti yokuqala itholakala, kuzothatha isikhathi esiningi nomzamo.
詩意:
Le hexagram ifana nokufuna inaliti olwandle.
Konke kudinga ukusebenza kanzima.
解曰: Inhlanhla iyisisekelo senhlanhla. U-Lu uyimbewu yesibusiso. Chaza ngokucacile. Kutuswa ukuqapha.
籤詩故事一:
◇U-Huang Xiaozi useshe izihlobo zakhe izinkulungwane zamamayela
U-Huang Juejing wayengowase-Jianchang. Lapho eneminyaka emihlanu ubudala, washonelwa unina ngenxa yempi. Ngemva kwesikhashana, wafunga ezulwini ukuthi uzophindaphinda imibhalo yobuBuddha ukuze athole unina. Wabe esewela uMfula iHuai wahamba ecela.Waqunga umoya nemvula futhi wabekezelela ubunzima.Emva kweminyaka engamashumi amabili nesishiyagalombili, wafika eChundian, esiFundeni saseLiang, eRuzhou, lapho agcina ethole khona unina futhi wabuya.
聖意: Umuzi awukuphathi kahle, qaphela ukufuna ingcebo, wenze isivumelwano, futhi ushade.Liujia livimba abahamba ngezinyawo ligcina abantu emasimini.Izikelemu zinhle.Ungafuyi.Kunzima ukuthola abantu. kunzima ukumangalela.Kufanelekile ukuthutha.Kufanelekile ukuthutha impahla elahlekile.Kunzima ukululama ezifweni ezimbi.Ukuhlaliswa kwesikhashana emathuneni asezintabeni.
古人: U-Huang Xiaozi wafuna izihlobo zakhe izinkulungwane zamamayela
